sn23.4:1.2: Āyasmā rādho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ rādhaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23.4:2.1: “Pariññeyye ca, rādha, dhamme desessāmi pariññañca pariññātāviṃ puggalañca.
sn23.4:2.2: Taṃ suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn23.4:2.3: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā rādho bhagavato paccassosi.
sn23.4:2.6: Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, pariññeyyo dhammo, vedanā pariññeyyo dhammo, saññā pariññeyyo dhammo, saṅkhārā pariññeyyo dhammo, viññāṇaṃ pariññeyyo dhammo.
sn23.4:2.9: Yo kho, rādha, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo—
